PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1997-03591997-03-180,  HERITAGE,  ,  , 
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of THÉRÈSE SPÉNARD PILON, of Laval, Quebec, as a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum of Civilization, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, in the place of Andrée Beaudin-Richard, whose term has expired.
Attachments
